description: statistical outliers (threshold proportional to interquartile range)
transcription error in which the same data column (or row) has been keyed twice
date appears more than once (for daily data)
time stamp appears more than once
values outside 0-100 for variables bounded to that range (e.g., rh)
consistency between pair of variables (e.g., Tx>Tn)
simple visual check of the time series
significant weekly cycle in daily precipitation after a binomial test
difference between consecutive days exceeds a fixed threshold (for daily data)
value exceeds thresholds recommended by WMO guidelines
difference between consecutive observations exceeds thresholds recommended by WMO guidelines
